divs: sighting detailsi saw what i thought was a falling star on august 26, 2011 while celebrating my husband's birthday near peggy heller school. it glowed white\yellow and then stopped and hovered. after about three seconds it took off into another direction very rapidly toward santa fe\merced. only one of my other friends saw it too. it was a yellow sphere which turned blue when it changed direction. i work at castle airport and know that did not come from our airport. i just googled ufo sighting in atwater, ca today after i saw the same thing last night over santa fe going into merced. this time it looked bigger and a lot closer and changed from yellow, to red, to orange, to blue and hovered over the road. even after these sightings, i still don't believe in aliens. however you have to admit i saw some strange stuff.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Atwater
There was one other sighting in Atwater on or around August 26th 2011
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: UFO - round glowing object in Atwater, CA - August 26, 2011 & November 16, 2011
